int sceIoLseek32 (  SceUID  fd,
int  offset,
int  whence
) 
 

Reposition read/write file descriptor offset (32bit mode)

Parameters:
fd - Opened file descriptor with which to seek
offset - Relative offset from the start position given by whence
whence - Set to PSP_SEEK_SET to seek from the start of the file, PSP_SEEK_CUR seek from the current position and PSP_SEEK_END to seek from the end.
Returns:
The position in the file after the seek.
Example:
 pos = sceIoLseek32(fd, -10, PSP_SEEK_END);
